Name: M 179 - Orlando Marin, City Planning Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE BRONX BOROUGH PRESIDENT OF ORLANDO MARIN AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY PLANNING COMMISSION (M. 0179-2023).
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, pursuant Sections 31 and 192 of the City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Bronx Borough President of Orlando Marin as a member of the New York City Planning Commission to serve the remainder of a five-year term that expires on June 30, 2025 (M. 0179-2023).

COUPLED ON GO
